name: token-prices
description: Daily token price crawler for LLM providers

scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run crawl:all
scripts.dev:openai: npm run build && npm run crawl:openai
scripts.dev:anthropic: npm run build && npm run crawl:anthropic
scripts.dev:google: npm run build && npm run crawl:google
scripts.dev:openrouter: npm run build && npm run crawl:openrouter
scripts.dev:knock: npm run build && npm run knock
scripts.crawl:all: npm run crawl:openai && npm run crawl:anthropic && npm run crawl:google && npm run crawl:openrouter
scripts.test:local:openai: npm run build && node --experimental-vm-modules dist/test-local.js openai
scripts.test:local:anthropic: npm run build && node --experimental-vm-modules dist/test-local.js anthropic
scripts.test:local:google: npm run build && node --experimental-vm-modules dist/test-local.js google
scripts.test:local:openrouter: npm run build && node --experimental-vm-modules dist/test-local.js openrouter
